title: Cruise control doesn't deactivate
description: Brake pedal does not disable cruise control as expected.

title: Speedometer flickers
description: The digital speed display sometimes resets on dashboard.

title: Brake lights remain on
description: After releasing the brake pedal, the brake lights stay active.

title: Navigation map freezes
description: Map display stops responding after driving for 10 minutes.

title: Lane Assist beep too frequent
description: Lane assist warning beeps even when lane change is intended.
